name: 15-Minute S&P-500 Mean-Reversion BB-VPR
description: Intraday mean-reversion strategy for large-cap U.S. equities. Trades only during regular market hours on 15-minute bars. Longs entered when price closes below the 20-period lower Bollinger Band and Volume-Pressure Reversal Strategy (VPR) signals upside pressure; shorts on opposite conditions. Positions sized so a 0.8 % stop equals 0.5 % of equity. Exits at 1.4 % take-profit, 0.8 % stop-loss, or reversion to the 20-period SMA—whichever occurs first.
